blog.title: CV Craft Blog
blog.subtitle: Tips, tricks, and insights to help you land your dream job.

one.title: How to Write a Killer CV That Gets Noticed
one.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of crafting a compelling CV that stands out to recruiters and hiring managers.

two.title: 5 Common CV Mistakes and How to Avoid Them
two.excerpt: Don't let these simple errors cost you an interview. We break down the most common pitfalls.

three.title: Tailoring Your CV for Each Job Application
three.excerpt: A one-size-fits-all CV is a recipe for rejection. Discover how to customize your CV for every role.

four.title: The Importance of Keywords in Your CV
four.excerpt: Understand how Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) work and how to optimize your CV with the right keywords.

five.title: Creative vs. Professional: Which CV Template is Right for You?
five.excerpt: The right look can make a big impact. We'll help you decide which template best suits your industry and personality.

six.title: How to Quantify Your Achievements on Your CV
six.excerpt: Numbers speak louder than words. Learn how to turn your responsibilities into measurable achievements.

contact_page.title: Get In Touch
contact_page.subtitle: Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_page.form_description: Let us know how we can help.

pricing_page.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing_page.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for you and start building your dream CV today.

features_page.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features_page.subtitle: CV Craft is packed with powerful features to help you create a CV that opens doors.

ats.description: Our templates are designed to be easily parsed by Applicant Tracking Systems.

export.title: Easy PDF Export
